thread.title: Joanne

author: Joanne
title: Joanne
text:
I was dubious around the price, after being Quote: d £260 from main dealer and £170.00 major chain.
The communication was excellent from the start and throughout. The garage rang to confirm time the day before and two great guys turned up at the time stated and delivered the car back at the time stated.
I kept waiting for the catch it didn't come!!!
I was charged the amount Quote: d the payment was simple and I saved £170.00 what more can I say but thank you
